text:
Greetings everyone,

New here, and new to developing in HubSpot. Been familiarizing myself with HubSpot APIs and private apps.

My question – is there a way to make a Workflow trigger a private app – in a way that *doesn't* require a Webhook or a Custom Code Action?

For context, we simply want to select Contact(s) in HubSpot, solicit some user input, then save new Deal(s) via API. We can already accomplish _most_ of this with a workflow – except of course for the pesky "solicit user input" part.

Is this a use case for a Custom Workflow Action?

I see that Webhooks and Custom Code Actions require Operations Hub Professional ($$$), and as of yet, I'm unable to deduce if Custom Workflow Actions are in the same boat. At the moment, our use case is too small for that upgrade – so, sniffing around for ways to accomplish without the expense.

Thank you and nice-weekend wishes to all
